title: Looking for a ranked team 3v3 / or 5v5
body:
Looking to join a ranked team. Either 3v3 or 5v5 is fine with me.
Add me IGN: Hydrogen Fuel 
Just invite me to your team if you would like me 


(If a couple of people comment on this looking for a team as well I'm open to creating one.)

replies.body:
Hi there, I see you are looking for a team and if you are over 16, The Chaos Vanguard is a gaming community with over a 100 League of Legends players of various skill levels, so you are bound to find the team that is right for you. When you have passed your trial period you are free to make a ranked team with our members or join a pre-existing one. When you make a ranked team in CV you will receive your own personal ranked team channel on our teamspeak . We also offer a competitive scenario where you are able to play in tournaments against our existing teams as well as other communities. If you think this would be of interest to you, please contact me on LoL or sign up to the website. If you get tired of LoL, we have other sections for games such as; Counter Strike, DOTA 2, Smite, Archeage, Heroes of the Storm, H1Z1 and Elder Scrolls Online.
Thanks,
CV Fake

Website: http://thechaosvanguard.co.uk/
TeamSpeak: ts3.thechaosvanguard.co.uk
I have a ranked team of silvers and golds that could use you if interested. We will be playing around 2 est. Friend me if you want to play.
